property_info.source: 1889 Atlas of Medford by George A. Stadley Co., Boston; 1890 City Directory
property_info.outbuildings: A landlocked side-gable building located directly behind at #24 may originally have been a carriage house but had been converted to a dwelling by 1897; two-bay detached garage, early 20th century.
property_info.setting: densely settled residential district of large-scale, elaborate, professionally designed single family houses of the same period; the area abuts the institutional and commercial core of Medford at the base of Pasture Hill lining High Street
